title: Michael J. Woodard
summary: Michael Jordan Woodard (born October 6, 1997) is an American singer and voice actor. He made it to the top 5 on season 16 of American Idol before being eliminated. He is the voice of Arlo in the Netflix film Arlo the Alligator Boy and the follow-up series I ♥ Arlo, for which he has received award nominations.
